abstract: The media conglomerate, under scrutiny as an indicator of whether weakness is seeping deeper into the economy, said that operating income in its parks and resorts unit rose 33 percent.
snippet: The media conglomerate, under scrutiny as an indicator of whether weakness is seeping deeper into the economy, said that operating income in its parks and resorts unit rose 33 percent.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Mickey Mouse, so far at least, is not a discretionary expense.

abstract: The Walt Disney Co., the owner of ABC, ESPN and the Disney Channel, reported second-quarter profit that exceeded analysts’ estimates on Tuesday. Bloomberg reports:
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Co., the owner of ABC, ESPN and the Disney Channel, reported second-quarter profit that exceeded analysts’ estimates on Tuesday. Bloomberg reports:

headline.main: Broadcast, Cable Profits Grow At Disney
